titles.title: Platform Integrity Act
Platform Integrity Act
To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to clarify section 230(c)(1) of such Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Platform Integrity Act
This bill specifies that providers and users of interactive computer services (e.g., social media) may be held liable for third-party content if they promote or otherwise recommend the content.
